description: This file defines the GameState class which manages the state of a Tic-Tac-Toe game, including the game board, current player, game mode, and game result. It provides methods for making moves, resetting the game, and evaluating game status.

classes.name: GameState
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages the state of a Tic-Tac-Toe game, including the game board, current player, mode (vs AI or player), and game result. It provides methods for game actions such as making moves, resetting the board, and evaluating the game status.

methods.name: setMode
methods.description: Sets the game mode to AI or human and resets the board accordingly.

methods.name: resetBoard
methods.description: Clears the game board, resets the current player to 'X', and resets game result. Maintains or resets the game mode based on input.

methods.name: makeMove
methods.description: Attempts to place current player's mark at the given index; returns false if move is invalid, otherwise updates the board and checks game status.

methods.name: _togglePlayer
methods.description: Switches the current player between 'X' and 'O'.

methods.name: _evaluateBoard
methods.description: Checks all possible winning lines for a win or draw, updating the result accordingly.

methods.name: winningLine
methods.description: Returns the list of indices that make up the winning line, or an empty list if no win.
